regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,control import re if not control.infoLabel('Container.PluginName') == 'plugin.video.thecrew': return r = re.findall('(?s)class="competition".*?title="Buffstreams([^"]*)"\s*href="([^"]*).*?score">\s*([^<]*)\n.', page_data) return r

regex.name: lists
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): from resources.lib.modules import client import re,requests t = requests.get('[makelist.param2]').text x = re.findall('(?s)stream-link="([^"]*)(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>([^<]*).*?platinum">([^<]*)',t) #z = re.findall('(?s)stream-link="([^"]*)(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>([^<]*)',t) sort = [(client.tinyw(i[0]) ,i[1],i[2]) for i in x if 'Platinum'in i[2] if 'p2pstreams' not in i[0] if 'sportinglive' not in i[0] if 'DAZN' not in i[1] if 'ripplestream4u' not in i[0] if 'espnonline' not in i[0] if 'papahd' not in i[0] if 'stakes100' not in i[0] if 'cr8soccer' not in i[0] if 'topstreamer' not in i[0]] #sort1 = [(client.tinyw(i[0] ,i[1]) for i in z ] return sort #+ sort1

regex.name: m3u
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client import xbmc,xbmcgui pDialog = xbmcgui.DialogProgress() pDialog.create('[B][COLOR orchid]THE CREW SPORTS[/COLOR][/B]', 'The Crew Is Loading Your Event Please Wait....') url = client.external('[lists.param1]') pDialog.update(65,'The Crew Is Loading Your Event Please Wait....') pDialog.close() if (pDialog.iscanceled()): return return url

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,control if not control.infoLabel('Container.PluginName') == 'plugin.video.thecrew': return url = client.schedule('https://streameast.app/ncaa-live-streams') return url

regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client import xbmc,xbmcgui pDialog = xbmcgui.DialogProgress() pDialog.create('[B][COLOR orchid]THE CREW SPORTS[/COLOR][/B]', 'The Crew Is Loading Your Event Please Wait....') url = client.external('[makelist.param1]') pDialog.update(65, 'The Crew Is Loading Your Event Please Wait....') pDialog.close() if (pDialog.iscanceled()): return return url

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import control import re if not control.infoLabel('Container.PluginName') == 'plugin.video.thecrew': return e = re.findall('(?s)<a href="([^"]*)" c.*?src="([^"]*).*?ing">([^<]*).*?">\s*([^<]*) ', page_data) sort = [(i[0],i[1],i[2],i[3]) for i in e if 'ncaa' in i[0]] return sort

regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): import re s = re.findall('(?s)<div class="media-body">\s*<a href="([^"]*).*?rc="([^"]*).*?e;">\s*([^<]*).*?e;">([^<]*)',page_data) return s

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import control import re if not control.infoLabel('Container.PluginName') == 'plugin.video.thecrew': return r = re.findall('btn-info.*title="([^"]*)".*href="([^"]*)"[\s\S]*?img.*?src.*?src="([^"]*)', page_data) return r

regex.name: makelist2
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = '[makelist.param2]'): from resources.lib.modules import client import xbmc,xbmcgui whitehat = 'http://playoffsstream.com/' + url pDialog = xbmcgui.DialogProgress() pDialog.create('[B][COLOR orchid]THE CREW SPORTS[/COLOR][/B]', 'The Crew Is Loading Your Event Please Wait....') url = client.external(whitehat) pDialog.update(65,'The Crew Is Loading Your Event Please Wait....') pDialog.close() if (pDialog.iscanceled()): return return url

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client import re page_data = client.request('http://yrsprts.stream/live?v=nba?g=knicks') r = re.findall('<a href="([^"]*)" title="([^"]*)(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>([^<]*)', page_data) sort = [(i[0],i[1],i[2]) for i in r if 'c=nba' in i[0]] return sort

regex.name: makelist2
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client import re w = re.findall('(?s)<iframe frameborder=0 height=100% width=100% src="([^"]*)', page_data)[0] h = client.request(w) i = re.findall('player">\s*<iframe style="width:100%;height:100%;" src="([^"]*)', h)[0] t = i.replace('ustv.php?ch=','srv/') e = t + '.m3u8' return e + '|User-Agent=Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:79.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/79.0&Referer=' + i

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,control if not control.infoLabel('Container.PluginName') == 'plugin.video.thecrew': return import re u = re.findall('<h2 class=\'post-title\'>\s*<a href=\'([^\']*)\'>([^<]*)', page_data) return u

regex.name: makelist2

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,control if not control.infoLabel('Container.PluginName') == 'plugin.video.thecrew': return import re u = re.findall('(?s)<h2 class=\'post-title entry-title\'>\s*<a href=\'([^\']*)\'>\s*([^<]*)', page_data) return u

regex.name: makelist2
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client import re w = re.findall('<iframe src=\'([^\']*)', page_data)[0] h = client.request(w) i = re.findall('source:\s*\'([^\']*)', h)[0] return i + '|user-agent=iPad&referer=' + w

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client import re page_data = client.request('http://yoursports.stream') r = re.findall('<a href="([^"]*)" title="([^"]*)(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>([^<]*)', page_data) sort = [('http://yoursports.stream/'+i[0],i[1],i[2]) for i in r if 'c=nba' in i[0]] return sort

regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client url = client.external('[makelist.param1]') return url

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,control if not control.infoLabel('Container.PluginName') == 'plugin.video.thecrew': return import re items = re.findall('(?s)float: right;">([^<]*)(?:.*?f=")([^"]*)', page_data) sort = [(i[0],'http://sports24.club'+i[1]) for i in items] return sort

regex.name: player
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,control import re,base64 l = re.findall('atob\(["|\']([^"|\']*)', page_data)[0]; l = base64.b64decode(l) l = l.replace('https:','') l = l.replace('//','https://') if l.startswith('/'): l = 'https://sports24.club' + l return l + '|user-agent=iPad&referer=[makelist.param2]'
